inn1.comm: on a good length outside the off stump, Sangakkara gets behind it and pushes to cover
on the middle stump and curving away, Sangakkara looks to play his trademark shot on the leg side, but does not get the neccessary timing
now on the off stump and swinging away, asking questions of Sangakkara. Any batsman would have been beaten by that as it was pitched in the right area
short outside the off stump, cut to point
on the off stump, left alone by Sangakkara

Hero, one day and zero, the next as Sangakkara, visibly tired by yesterdays effort shows some lax footwork and pays the price for it as he is plumb in front. This was the shot in the arm that the bowler's were looking for
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Udawatte steers it to third man for a single
half volley outside the off stump, Mahela drives it to mid off
on the leg stump, Mahela pushes it to square leg
thats a huge wide outside the off stump
finds his line finally as he pitches one just outside the off stump and swinging away a touch. Udawatte has no other option but to let it go
on the leg stump and swining in, now then the result can be guessed- it's a wide
juicy full toss on the off stump, Udawatte's bottom hand comes off as he plays the whip shot, thus not imparting enough timing on the delivery. Nevertheless, it has enough to fetch him three runs
on the leg stump, Mahela defends it to midwicket
short outside the off stump, Udawatte looks to steer it away but gets a bottom edge back to the keeper
short outside the off stump, Udawatte moves onto the backfoot and steers it wide of the point fielder for a single
short and wide outside the off stump, Jayawardene, with apparent lack of footwork cuts it a touch too close for his comfort as the ball travels in the air to third man for a couple
short outside the off stump, Mahela cuts it to third man once again, but this time along the ground
short outside the off stump, left alone by Udawatte
rapped high on the pads and the batsmen run across for a leg bye
on the leg stump, Udawatte looks to flick it away but is struck on the pads once again as they run across for a leg bye
manages to get the outside edge but to compound the pain, the ball runs away to the third man boundary. It was possible because the third man was stationed at what would be called deep point
wide down the leg side
this is real poor bowling as he bowls one outside the off stump, which shows the lack of control
strikes the good length outside the off stump as Mahela defends it to cover
normal service restored as Hashmi goes hunting down the leg side again
deja vu as he himself is contributing to his work load as he has only bowled 3 legitimate deliveries
makes one slant in from outside off, Mahela pushes it back to the bowler
half volley on the leg stump, Mahela eases it past mid on to fetch an easy three for himself
fuller on the middle stump, Udawatte moves back and makes room for himself as he smashes it back past the bowler on the leg side for a boundary.
outside the off stump, Mahela defends on the frontfoot
full outside the off stump, Mahela looks to drive it through covers but can't get past the fielder
outside the off stump and on a good length, defends on the frontfoot
short outside the off stump, Mahela cuts it to third man for a single
outside the off stump, Udawatte looks to let the delivery go but then changes his mind and defends it off the backfoot
outside the off stump, Udawatte is looking to steer but gets a bottom edge back onto the pitch
short on the leg stump, Mahela rocks back and pulls it ferociously behind square leg for a boundary
short outside the off stump, Mahela reaches for the delivery and cuts it to sweeper  cover to run three
drifts down the leg side, Udawatte has an ugly swipe at it and gets a bottom edge  back to third man for a single
short outside the off stump, and called a wide
outside the off stump, left alone by Mahela
outside the off stump and Mahela lets it go to the keeper
wide outside the off stump
on the leg stump, pushes to midwicket
on the leg stump, Udawatte pushes it to square leg for a single
outside the off stump, Mahela goes onto the backfoot and defends
outside the off stump, Mahela looks to cut it away but does not get any piece of wood onto it as the ball travels to the keeper
outside the off stump, Mahela pushes it to cover
outside the off stump, Mahela pushes it to cover for a single
on the leg stump, Udawatte flicks it away to fine leg for a single
fuller outside the off stump, Udawatte lofts it away to mid off for a couple
outside the off stump, Udawatte goes one better as he lofts it away over covers for a boundary
outside the off stump, Udawatte lofts it over long off for a boundary
fuller on the off stump, pushes it to long on for a single
short outside the off stump, cut to point
on the leg stump, Mahela flicks it away to fine leg for a single
outside the off stump, Mahela comes down the track and lofts it away over covers for a boundary
outside the off stump, and fuller in length. Mahela drives it through extra cover for a boundary
on the leg stump, Mahela flicks it away to square leg for a boundary
on the leg stump, pulled away to fine leg for another boundary. That makes it four in four
outside the off stump, pushes it to third man for a single
outside the off stump, cut to third man for a single
short outside off, cut to point but no run taken
fuller outside the off stump, Udawatte drives it to cover for a single
on the leg stump, flicks it to fine leg for a couple
on the leg stump, sweeps it to short fine leg
on the off stump, pulls it to fine leg for a single
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the off stump with a lot of loop. Mahela pushes it to midwicket
on the leg stump, Mahela pushes it to short fine leg for a couple
short outside the off stump, Mahela cuts it past point for a couple
on the off stump, Mahela comes down the track and pushes it wide of the mid off fielder for a single
on the leg stump, Udawatte looks to turn it away and is struck on his pads
short outside the off stump, cut to deep point to retain the strike
fuller in length outside the off stump, Udawatte drives it past cover into the outfield for a couple
on the leg stump, Udawatte turns it away on the leg side for another couple
short outside the off stump, Udawatte looks to cut it away but is beaten by the late spin
fuller on the off stump, Udawatte comes forward and pushes it through the cover region for a single
the bane of all the bowler's of UAE, wide delivery down the leg side
fuller in length on the off stump, Mahela goes down down on one knee and pulls the slog sweep out of his arsenal as beats the fielder in the deep by a margin
time for some cheekiness as he cuts the ball off the keeper's gloves for a single
fuller on the leg stump, Mahela turns it away to fine leg for a single to bring up his 45th half century
on the middle stump, Udawatte comes down the track and lofts it away to long on for a couple
outside the off stump, Udawatte comes onto the frontfoot and pushes it to cover
the way he is playing, it seems as if Udawatte is on 1-2 routine as he comes down the track and lofts it away to long on for the boundary as mid on was in
outside the off stump, Udawatte creams it past the cover fieldsman for a boundary to bring the 100 up
how did that miss the off stump? Udawatte has an ugly swipe and misses it as he is struck on the back leg. Could call him as being plumb but then Taufel see's it the other way round
outside the off stump, Jayawardene lofts it over cover for a couple
on the off stump, Mahela once again plays the slog sweep towards the cow corner for another boundary
outside the off stump, Mahela slices it to third man for a single
outside the off stump, Udawatte comes forward and pushes it to mid on
outside the off stump, Udawatte drives it to long off for a single

as smooth as it can get, Mahela comes down the track and lofts a fuller delivery on the off stump, back over the bowler's head for a boundary. How clean does that look as Mahela does it with minimal fuss
short outside the off stump, Udawatte cuts and misses
on the middle stump, Udawatte comes forward and defends
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot

outside the off stump, Udawatte steers it to short third man and sets off for a quick single and the fielder throws the stumps down with precision. Third Umpires help is sought and replays suggest that he was out and he flashes the red light
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
drifts onto the leg stump and Kapugedera easily sweeps it away to fine leg, where a misfield allows him a boundary
on the leg stump, pushes it to fine leg for a single
outside the off stump, Kapugedera drives it to mid off for a single
on the leg stump, Udawatte comes down the track and pushes it to deep square leg for a single
short outside the off stump, Kapugedera cuts it right in between the fielders at point and cover for a boundary
outside the off stump, Kapugedera pushes it to midwicket to rotate the strike
wide down the leg side
pitches it on the leg stump once again as Udawatte sweeps it to fine leg for a single
outside the off stump, Udawatte comes forward and defends it
full in length outside the off stump, Udawatte comes forward and drives it to cover for a single
on the leg stump, Kapugedera comes down the track and pushes it to midwicket for a single
fuller outside the off stump, Udawatte drives it down the track on the off side for a single
Kapugedera has an initial stride down the track and Tauqir notices it as he slips a faster one in on the off stump line, Kapugedera has to have a prod at it and is caught by the keeper
on the leg stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, pushes it to midwicket for a single
outside the off stump, pushes it to cover for a single
on the leg stump, eases it to fine leg
on the off stump, pushes it to cover for a single
on the leg stump, Udawatte pushes it to long on to bring up his half century
on the leg stump, Silva turns it to fine leg for a single
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, Silva pushes it to deep midwicket for a couple
on the off stump, pushes it to mid on for a single
long hop outside off, called a wide
on the leg stump, pushes it to fine leg for a single
fuller outside the off stump, Silva defends on the frontfoot
short outside the off stump, Silva goes onto the backfoot and looks to cut it away in the gap but gets a leading edge to short third man and has to go back disappointed
on the leg stump, Udawatte pushes it to midwicket for a single
outside the off stump, pushes it to covers for a single
outside the off stump, Udawatte drives it to long on for a single
outside the off stump, Dilshan makes room and drives it to cover for a single
outside the off stump, Udawatte drives it to long on for a single
fuller on the middle stump, Dilshan defends on the frontfoot
on a good length outside the off stump, Udawatte drives it back to the bowler
fuller outside the off stump, Udawatte drives it to sweeper cover for a single
on the leg stump, Dilshan turns it away to fine leg for another single
outside the off stump, the bounce deceives Udawatte as he is struck on the gloves
on the leg stump, Udawatte pushes it to long on
on the leg stump, Dilshan pushes it to fine leg for a single
short outside the off stump, Dilshan cuts it to sweeper cover for a couple
outside the off stump, Dilshan comes forward and pushes it to cover for a single
on the off stump, Udawatte pushes it to mid on
outside the off stump, Udawatte looks to pull it away but is beaten by the turn
fuller on the leg stump, Udawatte pushes it to mid on for a single
on a good length on the off stump, Dilshan pushes it to cover and does not take a run
on the leg stump, Udawatte pushes it to mid on for a single
outside the off stump, Dilshan slices it to short third man for a single
on the leg stump, Udawatte looks to whip it away but does not beat the fielder at midwicket
on the leg stump, pushes it to midwicket again
outside the off stump, Udawatte pushes it to cover this time round
on the leg stump, pushes it back to the bowler
short outside off, cut to point
on the off stump, Dilshan comes forward and defends
outside the off stump, Dilshan comes forward and drives it to mid off for a single
on the leg stump, Udawatte pushes it to long on for a single
short outside the off stump, Dilshan cuts it to point for a single. A poor throw from the fielder allows them to cross over
outside the off stump, Udawatte looks to sweep and is beaten by the turn but takes a bye
full on the off stump, Udawatte drives it down the ground for a boundary
on the leg stump, Udawatte flicks it away to square leg for a single
on the middle and leg, Dilshan turns it to midwicket for a single
short outside the off stump, Udawatte cuts it to deep point for a single
outside the off stump, Dilshan slices it to point for a single
drifts onto the leg stump and Dilshan sweeps it firmly behind square for a boundary
outside the off stump, defends on the front foot
outside the off stump, Dilshan pushes it to long off for a single
on the off stump, Udawatte hoicks it to deep midwicket for a single
outside the off stump, Dilshan drives it to long off to retain the strike
short outside the off stump, cut to point
short outside the off stump, cut to point
on the off stump, drives it to covers for a single
full outside the off stump, drives it to covers
on the off stump, Udawatte comes down the track and pushes it to long on for a single
on the leg stump, Dilshan moves onto the backfoot and turns it away to fine leg for a single
the slower ball, comes into the right hander, he pushes it firmlt back to Hashmi
fullish outside off and they take a quick single towards mid-off after the ball beats the diving cover fielder
soft dismissal! That was overpitched on middle and he made a bit of room to carve that across the line and over on the on side, the elevation was missing and Tauqir had a very easy take at midwicket
almost two in two! Fullish outside off, he leans forward and checks his stroke and the ball just clears cover
gets across and tucks it to the on side
fullish outside off, he pushes it softly to cover
outside the off stump, pushes it to sweeper cover for a single
on the off stump, drives it back to the bowler
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot to cover
fuller outside the off stump, drives it to cover yet again
outside the off stump, Weeraratne drives it to long off for a single
on the off stump, Dilshan wristily turns it to midwicket for a single
on a good length outside the off stump, Dilshan drives it to sweeper cover for a single
Weeraratne is living on the hook now as he flicks it on the leg side, the ball just falls short of the short midwicket
outside the off stump, pushes it to point
short on the off stump, Weeraratne pulls it to deep midwicket for a single

fuller in length outside the off stump, Dilshan goes for an extravagant drive through the covers but gets an outside edge back to the keeper. Alhashmi, has two wickets in two overs now and is rapturous now
on the leg stump, pushes it on the leg side with soft hands
outside the off stump, Tushara drives but gets an outside edge to short third man
fuller on the off stump, Weeraratne drives it to mid off
outside the off stump, Thushara drives it past covers for a boundary. It will ease some pressure on him
on the leg stump, Thushara defends on the backfoot
on the middle stump and turning, as Thushara defends on the frontfoot
full in length outside the off stump, Weeraratne drives it to mid off for a single
outside the off stump, Thushara guides it on it's way to third man for a couple
outside the off stump, defends on the backfoot to point for a single
full on the leg stump, Weeraratne flicks it to fine leg for a boundary. Poor ball by Alhashmi, he needs to be much straighter
short on the leg stump, Weeraratne pulls it away to fine leg
on the off stump and swinging away, left all alone by Thushara
short on the middle stump, Weeraratne pulls it off the backfoot to deep midwicket for a single
on the leg stump, Thushara sweeps it to fine leg but falls over in  doing so and gets only a single
on the middle stump, Weeraratne defends it on the frontfoot back to the bowler
short on the off stump, Weeraratne pulls it to deep midwicket, just wide of the fielder at midwicket for a couple
quicker one outside the off stump, Weeraratne defends it on the frontfoot
outside the off stump, Weeraratne drives it back to the bowler on the frontfoot
straight away he beats the outside edge of the batsman, who looks to drive it on the up
now he does that again as Thushara looks to cut it through the vacant point region and is beaten
this is sensible batting now as Thushara taps the ball on it's head to point and runs across for a single
short outside the off stump, Weeraratne stands tall and cuts it away but the fielder at point intercepts it and prevents a boundary, saves three runs for the team

Zahid does it for his captain as he manages to induce the edge from Thushara's bat. The keeper, who has been good throughout the day pouches it and sends him back on his way. Saqib's bowling changes are working like a dream today
fuller on the off stump, Kulasekara covers his stumps and pushes it to mid on and refuses a call for single
outside the off stump, Weeraratne is drawn forward with the flight and the resulting outside edge goes to third man for a couple
outside the off stump and left alone by Weeraratne
outside the off stump, Weeraratne pushes it to mid off
outside the off stump, Weeraratne drives it to long off for a single
flighted delivery outside the off stump, Kulasekara taps it to cover
outside the off stump, left alone by Kulasekara
on the leg stump, Weeraratne pushes it to midwicket for a single
fuller outside the off stump, Kulasekara comes forward and defends it back to the  bowler
fuller outside the off stump, Kulasekara drives it to sweeper cover, where a fielding error allows him to take a couple
fuller on the middle stump, Kulasekara walks across and defends it on the frontfoot
chin music here as Kulasekara looks to duck under it by turning his eyes from the ball and is struck on the helmet. The ball goes to third man off the helmet
on the leg stump, rapped on the pads again as they run across for a single
outside the off stump, pushes to covers for a single
outside the off stump, Kulasekara moves onto the backfoot and slices it to short third man
full on the off stump, Kulasekara comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
short outside the off stump, Kulasekara cuts it to deep point for a single
fuller in length outside the off stump, Weeraratne reaches for it and defends on the frontfoot
outside the off stump again as Weeraratne gets onto the backfoot and pushes it to cover
on a good length outside the off stump, Kulasekara reaches out for it and pushes it to sweeper for a single
on a good length outside the off stump, Weeraratne comes onto the frontfoot and yorks himself and just pushes it to midwicket
on the leg stump again as Weeraratne stays put in the crease and pushes it to midwicket for a single
short on the middle stump, Kulasekara covers his stumps and pushes it to mid on for a single
fuller on the leg stump, Weereratne whips it behind square to fine leg where a slight delay in picking the ball up results in a couple being given
on a good length outside the off stump, Weeraratne comes onto the frontfoot and presents a dead face
outside the off stump, beats the outside edge with the turn
short outside the off stump, Kulasekara rocks back and cuts it in the gap between gully and point for a couple
on a good length outside the off stump, Weeraratne slices it to cover for a single
on a good length on the leg stump, Kulasekara moves across and pushes it behind the stumps to fine leg and gets three runs
outside the off stump, pushes it to mid off for a single
short outside the off stump, Weeraratne gets onto the backfoot and pushes it to long off for a single
on a good length on the leg stump, Kulasekara moves back and eases it to fine leg for a single
on the leg stump, Weeraratne moves the front leg out of the way and pushes it to long on for a single
on the leg stump, Kulasekara pushes it to midwicket and runs across for a single
outside the off stump, Weeraratne drives it back to the bowler
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the off stump, pushes it to cover for a single
on the leg stump, Weeraratne turns it to square leg for a single
on the off stump, pushes it to cover
on the off stump, slices it to short third man
on the leg stump, paddles it to short fine leg for a single
outside the off stump, Weeraratne pushes it back to the bowler
fuller in length on the off stump, Kulasekara comes forward and drives it to long off for a couple
fuller on the leg stump, pushes it to square leg for a single
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
on a good length outside the off stump, cuts it to point
fuller outside the off stump, Weeraratne drives it to long off for a single
outside the off stump, slices it to short third man, where a fumble allows a single
outside the off stump,Kulasekara looks to cut it away but is rapped on the pads
outside the off stump, Kulasekara slices it to short third man for a single
full on the off stump, Weeraratne comes down the track and lofts it high over the bowler for a boundary
on the leg stump, pushes it to midwicket for a single
on the leg stump, paddles it to fine leg for a couple
on the middle stump, Kulasekara defends it on the backfoot
outside the leg stump, Weeraratne pushes it to fine leg for a single
on the leg stump, Kulasekara pushes it to midwicket
on the off stump, drives it back to the bowler
on the leg stump, Weeraratne pushes it to deep midwicket for a single
on the leg stump, Kulasekara drives it to long on for a single
Weeraratne does the same as Kulasekara did the previous ball- drive to long on
on the leg stump, pushes it to midwicket for a single
fuller on the off stump, Kulasekara drives it to long off for a single
on the leg stump, pushes it back to the bowler
on the leg stump, chips it behind square on the leg side for a single
outside the leg stump, rapped on the pads. Runs across for a leg bye
on the leg stump, Weeraratne looks to force it away but is rapped on the pads
fuller on the leg stump, pushes it to long on for a single
finally they have their man as Weeraratne chips it to long off where the catch is taken easily
on the off stump, pushes it to square leg for a single
on the leg stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, pushes it to long on for a single
on the leg stump again as he pushes it to square leg
short outside the off stump, looks to cut and is beaten
on the leg stump, Kulasekara drives it to mid on for a single
outside the off stump, cut to deep point for a single
short outside off, Mendis cuts it to sweeper cover for a couple
short outside off, drives it to long off for a single
full outside the off stump, drives it to sweeper cover for a couple
outside the off stump, off the outside edge to third man for a single
full on the off stump, digs it out to long on for a single
swinging away from off stump, beats the outside edge
full outside the off stump, pushes it to cover for a single
fuller outside the off stump, off the outside edge to third man
on a good length on the off stump, pushes it to mid on to retain the strike
short outside the off stump, cut to point
on the off stump, looks to sweep it away but is beaten
full in length outside the off stump, drives it to cover, who does not throw as there is no back up
short outside off, cut to point for a single
full outside the off stump, drives it to long off and run across for a couple
short outside off, cut to point for a single
on the off stump, shuffles and gets an inside edge for a single
full outside the off stump, looks to slog it away but misses
outside the off stump, beats the outside edge again
full on the middle stump, forces it to long on for a couple
slower delivery gets him as he fails to connect the shot and the ball ends up in safe hands of Khurram Khan at deep midwicket
full toss outside off, carves it over cover for a boundary

inn2.comm: begins with a wide outside the off stump
wide outside the off stump again
on the leg stump, flicks it away to square leg for a boundary
walks across and flicks it away down to fine leg for a boundary
on the leg stump, this time he pushes it down the ground on the leg side for a boundary. He is not going to die thinking
outside the off stump, gets onto the backfoot and pushes it to cover for a single
outside the off stump, Arshad comes onto the frontfoot and lofts it over cover, the slow outfield does not allow the ball to go to the boundary
fuller on the leg stump, defends it to mid on and sets off for a single
full on the leg stump, Arshad glances it away to fine leg for a couple
full toss on the off stump, Arshad drives it back to the bowler
on the leg stump, defends to mid on
on the leg stump, pushes it to midwicket for a single
Is this Lara in disguise as he too, with the similar backlift drives it down the ground on the off side for a boundary.
on the off stump and fuller in length, drives it to mid off
outside the off stump, Arshad comes onto the frontfoot and looks to drive it on the off side but gets an inside edge to mid on
outside the off stump, Arshad looks to drive but gets an inside edge
outside the off stump, Arshad comes onto the frontfoot and defends
outside the off stump, Arshad pushes it to cover and sets off but Kapugedera sends the wickets down before he can reach the other end
on the leg stump, Amjad looks to pull it but is struck on the pads
on the leg stump again as he pulls it to midwicket
outside the off stump, defends it to point
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
full on the off stump, tries to cut it but does not split the gap
on the leg stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the middle stump, comes onto the frontfoot and defends
short outside the off stump, cut to point
now this man is surely entertaining as he creams it through covers for a couple
bounces him and Amjad pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
outside the off stump, pushes it to cover for a single
full on the leg stump, Amjad whips it away to midwicket for a single
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
full on the off stump, drives it back to the bowler
on the off stump, Amjad gets back  and drives it back to the bowler
outside the off stump, Amjad drives it in air through covers and runs three
it's Indika's turn to drive it through covers now as he picks up three
fetch that! Amjad waits for the ball and unwinds as he sends the ball down the ground for a boundary
on the off stump, drives again but hits Indika's bat on the way and deflects to mid on or else it had a boundary stamped all over
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
outside the off stump, gets an outside edge to third man for a couple
fuller on the off stump, defends it back to the bowler
on the off stump and swinging in, struck high on the pads thus negating the appeal
outside the off stump, Indika comes forward and defends it
on the leg stump, pushes it to midwicket
fuller on the middle stump, Indika comes forward and defends it
defends on the frontfoot back to the bowler
short outside off, Indika upper cuts it to third man for a single
short outside the off stump, Amjad looks to pull it away but gets a top edge over the keeper's head for a boundary
outside the off stump, Fernando oversteps and Amjad lets it go
slower delivery on the middle stump. Amjad comes down the track and looks to pull it away but misses
short outside the off stump, Amjad pulls it to midwicket
Amjad was expecting the short ball and was waiting on the backfoot as he pulls it away to square leg for a boundary
outside the off stump, gets onto the backfoot and defends
full outside the off stump, Indika drives it to mid off
outside the off stump, Indika presents the full face of the bat as he defends it to mid off
outside the off stump and swinging away, beats the outside edge
outside the off stump, Indika comes forward and defends it
outside the off stump, drives it to mid off
drives it back to the bowler
slower outside the off stump, Amjad looks to drive it off the backfoot but gets an outside edge to short third man
where does this man come from? Comes down the track to a fuller delivery and lofts it over long on for a boundary
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot to cover
redhot Amjad now as he moves onto the backfoot and blasts it over square leg for a boundary. He  was helped by Kulasekara's sloppy fielding though
on the off stump, defends and gets an inside edge to the keeper, who does not field it and gives away a single
outside the off stump, defends to point
outside the off stump, Amjad defends it back onto the pitch
on the leg stump, Amjad pushes it to midwicket for a single
on the leg stump, Indika pushes it to midwicket
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
now there is the googly as it beats Indika
outside the off stump, gets onto the backfoot and defends it back to the bowler
on the off stump, drives it to mid on
outside the off stump, drives it to cover
on the leg stump, Amjad pushes it to midwicket
fuller on the off stump, drives it back to the bowler
outside the off stump, Amjad looks to drive and gets an inside edge
wide down the leg side
on the leg stump, comes onto the frontfoot and defends
on the leg stump, Indika pushes it to deep midwicket for a single
on the leg stump, Amjad looks to whip it away but gets an inside edge onto his pads
now there's the fifty for Amjad as he whips it all along the ground for a boundary
outside the off stump, Amjad pushes it to third man for a couple
on the off stump, Indika looks to flick it away but gets a leading edge, which does not carry to the bowler
wide down the leg side
pushes it to square leg for a single
on the off stump, drives it back to the bowler
outside the off stump, pushes it to cover
outside the off stump, pushes it to mid off for a single
outside the off stump, pushes it to point
pitches outside the leg stump, negates the appeal
outside the off stump, Amjad comes down the track and drives it through covers for a boundary
